alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 24 at 3:29PM HST until December 25 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU AND MOLOKAI AND FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI UNTIL 6 PM HST SUNDAY... .Advisory-level surf will continue for exposed north and west facing shores of the smaller islands through the weekend due to overlapping northwest (310-330 degrees) swells moving through. The current swell will remain elevated as the next swell builds through the early morning hours Sunday. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Surf building to 18 to 22 feet along north facing shores and 14 to 18 feet along west facing shores. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, and Molokai, and north facing shores of Maui. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
